title: Send Weekly Transaction Status Update
description: The TC needs to send a weekly status update to the client and agent on a pending transaction.

tasks.description: Review the transaction checklist for the upcoming and completed tasks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the inspection is complete and the appraisal is scheduled for next week.

tasks.description: Draft a summary email outlining the current status.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, concise email is written summarizing what has been done and what is next.

tasks.description: Send the summary email to the client, agent, and lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: The status update email is sent to all relevant parties.
